variable.name: abvneu
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) Neuroticism: Total scale score

variable.name: ABVneu1
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 1: Do you often have fantasies about things that could never come true?

variable.name: ABVneu10
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 10: When you talk to people, do you often find that your thoughts are somewhere else?

variable.name: ABVneu11
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 11: Are you often unable to sleep because there are so many thoughts going through your head?

variable.name: ABVneu12
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 12: Do you enjoy indulging in daydreams?

variable.name: ABVneu13
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 13: Do you often feel listless and tired without knowing why?

variable.name: ABVneu14
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 14: Are you bubbling with energy and eager to work at times and very slow-going and washed-out at other times?

variable.name: ABVneu15
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 15: Have you ever had senseless thoughts that kept coming up?

variable.name: ABVneu16
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 16: Are you generally an even-tempered person?

variable.name: ABVneu17
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 17: Are your feelings easily hurt?

variable.name: ABVneu18
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 18: Are you ever so restless that you can't sit still for long?

variable.name: ABVneu19
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 19: Do you ever feel thoroughly miserable without knowing why?

variable.name: ABVneu2
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 2: Are you often dissatisfied or grumpy?

variable.name: ABVneu20
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 20: Do you often feel guilty about things?

variable.name: ABVneu21
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 21: Are you often in a sad mood?

variable.name: ABVneu22
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 22: Do you sometimes feel in high spirits and then again dejected without knowing why?

variable.name: ABVneu23
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 23: Do you often experience mood swings?

variable.name: ABVneu24
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 24: Are there times that you prefer to be alone and that you can't stand having people around?

variable.name: ABVneu25
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 25: Are you often kept awake at night because of worries?

variable.name: ABVneu26
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 26: Do you find it difficult to get over disappointments?

variable.name: ABVneu27
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 27: Do you ever suffer from nightmares?

variable.name: ABVneu28
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 28: Do you worry about possible set backs?

variable.name: ABVneu29
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 29: Do you often feel nervous or tense in the presence of superiors?

variable.name: ABVneu3
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 3: Do you often worry about the past?

variable.name: ABVneu30
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 30: Do you tend to take things to heart?

variable.name: ABVneu4
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 4: Do you often feel lonely?

variable.name: ABVneu5
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 5: Are you easily irritable?

variable.name: ABVneu6
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 6: Does it often happen that you take too long to come to a decision?

variable.name: ABVneu7
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 7: When you try to concentrate and keep your mind on something, do your thoughts often run astray?

variable.name: ABVneu8
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 8: Do you find yourself a nervous and tense person?

variable.name: ABVneu9
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) neuroticism item 9: Do you ever have the strange feeling that you're not your old self?

variable.name: ABVsom
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints: Total scale score

variable.name: ABVsom1
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 1: Do you sweat easily, even when it is not hot?

variable.name: ABVsom10
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 10: Are you often out of breath when you're doing physically strenuous work?

variable.name: ABVsom11
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 11: Do you feel physically healthy?

variable.name: ABVsom12
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 12: Do you think you have a good memory?

variable.name: ABVsom13
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 13: Do you usually feel weak?

variable.name: ABVsom14
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 14: Do you ever feel dizzy?

variable.name: ABVsom15
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 15: Do you often suffer from diarrhea?

variable.name: ABVsom16
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 16: Do you often feel that your hands are shaking when you want to do something?

variable.name: ABVsom17
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 17: Do you have a good appetite?

variable.name: ABVsom2
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 2: Are your hands clammy and moist?

variable.name: ABVsom3
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 3: Do you often suffer from headaches?

variable.name: ABVsom4
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 4: Do you empty your bowels every day?

variable.name: ABVsom5
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 5: Do you suffer from palpitations?

variable.name: ABVsom6
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 6: Do you often suffer from stomach problems?

variable.name: ABVsom7
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 7: Do you sometimes see things as a blur?

variable.name: ABVsom8
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 8: Do you often suffer from colds?

variable.name: ABVsom9
variable.description: Amsterdamse Biografische Vragenlijst (ABV) somatic complaints item 9: Do you usually get up feeling fit and rested in the morning?

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at most recent assessment

variable.name: alcohol
variable.description: In past 12 months, did you have at least 12 alcoholic drinks?

variable.name: bai01
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 1: Numbness or tingling

variable.name: bai02
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 2: Feeling hot

variable.name: bai03
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 3: Wobbliness in legs

variable.name: bai04
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 4: Unable to relax

variable.name: bai05
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 5: Fear of worst happening

variable.name: bai06
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 6: Dizzy or light-headed

variable.name: bai07
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 7: Heart pounding/racing

variable.name: bai08
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 8: Unsteady

variable.name: bai09
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 9: Terrified or afraid

variable.name: bai10
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 10: Nervous

variable.name: bai11
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 11: Feeling of choking

variable.name: bai12
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 12: Hands trembling

variable.name: bai13
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 13: Shaky/unsteady

variable.name: bai14
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 14: Fear of losing control

variable.name: bai15
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 15: Difficulty in breathing

variable.name: bai16
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 16: Fear of dying

variable.name: bai17
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 17: Scared

variable.name: bai18
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 18: Indigestion

variable.name: bai19
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 19: Faint/light-headed

variable.name: bai20
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 20: Face flushed

variable.name: bai21
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) anxiety item 21: Hot/cold sweats

variable.name: baiscal
variable.description: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) Total scale score - Degree of current anxiety

variable.name: BECKdep
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form Total score

variable.name: BECKdep1
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 1
variable.value: I am blue or sad all the time and I can't snap out of it.
I am so sad or unhappy that I can't stand it.

variable.name: BECKdep10
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 10
variable.value: I don't feel I look any worse than I used to.
I am worried that I am looking old and less attractive.
I feel that there are permanent changes in my appearance that make me unattractive.
I feel that I am ugly and repulsive.

variable.name: BECKdep11
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 11
variable.value: I can work as well as before.
It takes extra effort to get started at something.
I have to push myself very hard to do anything.
I can't do any work at all.

variable.name: BECKdep12
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 12
variable.value: I don't get more tired than usual.
I get tired more easily than I used to.
I get tired from doing anything.
I get too tired to do anything.

variable.name: BECKdep13
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 13
variable.value: My appetite is no worse than usual.
My appetite is not as good as it used to be.
My appetite is much worse now.
I have no appetite at all anymore.

variable.name: BECKdep2
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 2
variable.value: I am not particularly pessimistic or discouraged about the future.
I feel discouraged about the future.
I feel that I have nothing to look forward to.
I feel that the future is hopeless and that things cannot improve.

variable.name: BECKdep3
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 3
variable.value: I do not feel like a failure.
I feel I have failed more than the average person.
As I look back on my life, all I can see is a lot of failures.
I feel I am a complete failure as a person (parents, husband, wife).

variable.name: BECKdep4
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 4
variable.value: I don't enjoy things the way I used to.
I don't get satsfaction out of anything anymore.

variable.name: BECKdep5
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 5
variable.value: I feel bad or unworthy a good part of the time.
I feel as though I am very bad or worthless.

variable.name: BECKdep6
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 6
variable.value: I don't feel disappointed in myself.

variable.name: BECKdep7
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 7
variable.value: I don't have any thoughts of harming myself.
I feel I would be better off dead.
I have definite plans about committing suicide.
I would kill myself if I had the chance.

variable.name: BECKdep8
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 8
variable.value: I have not lost interest in other people.
I am less interested in other people now than I used to be.
I have lost most of my interest in other people and have not much feelings for them.
I have lost all my interest in other people and don't care about them at all.

variable.name: BECKdep9
variable.description: Beck Depression Inventory Short Form item 9
variable.value: I make decisions about as well as ever.
I try to put off making decisions.
I have great difficulty in making decisions.
I can't make any decision at all anymore.

variable.name: case
variable.description: Is this participant a case or a control?
variable.value: MDD patients with lifetime diagnosis on a CIDI interview

variable.name: educat
variable.description: Highest education finished with a diploma
variable.value: general intermediate through intermediate vocational education

variable.name: european
variable.description: North-European ancestry

variable.name: famrisc
variable.description: Family history of major depression: First degree family member with depression

variable.name: ID
variable.description: Case identifier (based on DNA sample code)

variable.name: ids01
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 1: Falling asleep
variable.value: I never take longer than 30 minutes to fall asleep
I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, less than half the time
I take at least 30 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time
I take more than 60 minutes to fall asleep, more than half the time

variable.name: ids02
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 2: Sleep during the night
variable.value: I do not wake up at night
I have a restless, light sleep with a few brief awakenings each night
I wake up at least once a night, but I go back to sleep easily
I awaken more than once a night and stay awake for 20 minutes or more, more than half the time

variable.name: ids03
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 3: Waking up too early
variable.value: Most of the time, I awaken no more than 30 minutes before a need to get up
More than half the time, I awaken more than 30 minutes before I need to get up
I almost always awaken at least one hour or so before I need to, but go back to sleep eventually
I awaken at least one hour before I need to, and can't go back to sleep

variable.name: ids04
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 4: Sleeping too much
variable.value: I sleep no longer than 7-8 hours/night, without napping during the day
I sleep no longer than 10 hours in a 24-hour period including naps
I sleep no longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps
I sleep longer than 12 hours in a 24-hour period including naps

variable.name: ids05
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 5: Feeling sad
variable.value: I feel sad less than half the time
I feel sad more than half the time
I feel sad nearly all of the time

variable.name: ids06
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 6: Feeling irritable
variable.value: I feel irritable less than half the time
I feel irritable more than half the time
I feel extremely irritable nearly all of the time

variable.name: ids07
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 7: Feeling anxious or tense
variable.value: I do not feel anxious or tense
I feel anxious (tense) less than half the time
I feel anxious (tense) more than half the time
I feel extremely anxious (tense) nearly all of the time

variable.name: ids08
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 8: Response of your mood to good or desired events
variable.value: My mood brightens to a normal level which lasts for several hours when good events occur
My mood brightens but I do not feel like my normal self when good events occur
My mood brightens only somewhat to a rather limited range of desired events
My mood does not brighten at all, even when very good or desired events occur in my life

variable.name: ids09a
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 9a: Mood in relation to the time of the day
variable.value: There is no regular relationship between my mood and the time of the day
My mood often relates to the time of the day because of environmental events (e.g. being alone, working) - go to 9B and 9C
In general, my mood is more related to the time of the day than to environmental events - go to 9B and 9C
My mood is clearly and predictably better or worse at a particular time each day - go to 9B and 9C

variable.name: ids09b
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 9b: Is your mood typically worse in the:

variable.name: ids09c
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 9c: Is your mood variation attributed to the environment?

variable.name: ids10
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 10: The quality of your mood
variable.value: The mood (internal feelings) that I experience is very much a normal mood
My mood is sad, but this sadness is pretty much like the sad mood I would feel if someone close to me died or left
My mood is sad, but this sadness has a rather different quality to it than the sadness I would feel if someone close to me died or left
My mood is sad, but this sadness is different from the type of sadness associated with grief or loss

variable.name: ids11
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 11: Changed Appetite
variable.value: There is no change in my usual appetite
I eat somewhat less often or lesser amounts of food than usual
I eat much less than usual and only with personal effort
I rarely eat within a 24-hour period, and only with extreme personal effort or when others persuade me to eat
I feel a need to eat more frequently than usual
I regularly eat more often and/or greater amounts of food than usual
I feel driven to overeat both at mealtime and between meals

variable.name: ids12
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 12: Changes in weight (within the last two weeks)
variable.value: I have not had a change in my weight
I feel as if I've had a slight weight loss
I have lost 2 pounds or more
I have lost 5 pounds or more
I feel as if I've had a slight weight gain
I have gained 2 pounds or more
I have gained 5 pounds or more

variable.name: ids13
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 13: Concentration/Decision Making
variable.value: There is no change in my usual capacity to concentrate or make decisions
I occasionally feel indecisive or find that my attention wanders
Most of the time, I struggle to focus my attention or to make decisions
I cannot concentrate well enough to read or cannot make even minor decisions

variable.name: ids14
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 14: View of Myself
variable.value: I see myself as equally worthwhile and deserving as other people
I am more self-blaming than usual
I largely believe that I cause problems for others
I think almost constantly about major and minor defects in myself

variable.name: ids15
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 15: View of my future
variable.value: I have an optimistic view of my future
I am occasionally pessimistic about my future, but for the most part I believe things will get better
I'm pretty certain that my immediate future -2 months) does not hold much promise of good things for me
I see no hope of anything good happening to me anytime in the future

variable.name: ids16
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 16: Thoughts of Death or Suicide
variable.value: I do not think of suicide or death
I feel that life is empty or wonder if it's worth living
I think of suicide or death several times a week for several minutes
I think of suicide or death several times a day in some detail, or I have made specific plans for suicide or have actually tried to take my life

variable.name: ids17
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 17: General Interest
variable.value: There is no change from usual in how interested I am in other people or activities
I notice that I am less interested in people or activities
I find I have interest in only one or two of my formerly pursued activities
I have virtually no interest in formerly pursued activities

variable.name: ids18
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 18: Energy Level
variable.value: There is no change in my usual level of energy
I get tired more easily than usual
I have to make a big effort to start or finish my usual daily activities (for example, shopping, homework, cooking or going to work)
I really cannot carry out most of my usual daily activities because I just don't have the energy

variable.name: ids19
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 19: Capacity for Pleasure or Enjoyment (excluding sex)
variable.value: I enjoy pleasurable activities just as much as usual
I do not feel my usual sense of enjoyment from pleasurable activities
I rarely get a feeling of pleasure from any activity
I am unable to get any pleasure or enjoyment from anything

variable.name: ids20
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 20: Interest in Sex (Please Rate Interest, not Activity)
variable.value: I'm just as interested in sex as usual
My interest in sex is somewhat less than usual or I do not get the same pleasure from sex as I used to
I have little desire for or rarely derive pleasure from sex
I have absolutely no interest in or derive no pleasure from sex

variable.name: ids21
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 21: Feeling slowed down
variable.value: I think, speak and move at my usual rate of speed
I find that my thinking is slowed down or my voice sounds dull or flat
It takes me several seconds to respond to most questions and I'm sure my thinking is slowed
I am often unable to respond to questions without extreme effort

variable.name: ids22
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 22: Feeling restless
variable.value: I'm often fidgety, wring my hands, or need to shift how I am sitting
I have impulses to move about and am quite restless
At times, I am unable to stay seated and need to pace around

variable.name: ids23
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 23: Aches and pains
variable.value: I don't have any feeling of heaviness in my arms or legs and don't have any aches or pains
Sometimes I get headaches or pains in my stomach, back or joints but these pains are only sometime present and they don't stop me from doing what I need to do
I have these sort of pains most of the time
These pains are so bad they force me to stop what I am doing

variable.name: ids24
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 24: Other bodily symptoms
variable.value: I don't have any of these symptoms: heart pounding fast, blurred vision, sweating, hot and cold flashes, chest pain, heart turning over in my chest, ringing in my ears, or shaking
I have some of these symptoms but they are mild and are present only sometimes
I have several of these symptoms and they bother me quite a bit
I have several of these symptoms and when they occur I have to stop doing whatever I am doing

variable.name: ids25
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 25: Panic/Phobic symptoms
variable.value: I have no spells of panic or specific fears (phobia) (such as animals or heights)
I have mild panic episodes or fears that do not usually change my behaviour or stop me from functioning
I have significant panic episodes or fears that force me to change my behaviour but do not stop me from functioning
I have panic episodes at least once a week or severe fears that stop me from carrying on my daily activities

variable.name: ids26
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 26: Constipation/diarrhea
variable.value: There is no change in my usual bowel habits
I have intermittent constipation or diarrhoea which is mild
I have diarrhoea or constipation most of the time but it does not interfere with my day-to-day functioning
I have diarrhoea or constipation for which I take medicine or which interferes with my day-to-day activities

variable.name: ids27
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 27: Interpersonal sensitivity
variable.value: I have not felt easily rejected, slighted, criticized or hurt by others
I have occasionally felt rejected, slighted, criticized or hurt by others
I have often felt rejected, slighted, criticized or hurt by others, but these feelings have had only slight effects on my relationships or work
I have often felt rejected, slighted, criticized or hurt by others and these feelings have impaired my relationships or work

variable.name: ids28
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) depression item 28: Leaden paralysis/physical energy
variable.value: I have not experienced the physical sensation of feeling weighted down and without physical energy
I have occasionally experienced periods of feeling physical weighted down and without physical energy, but without a negative effect on work, school , or activity level
I feel physically weighted down (without physical energy) more than half the time
I feel physically weighted down (without physical energy) more than half the time, several hours per day, several days per week

variable.name: ids_tot
variable.description: Inventory of Depression Severity (IDS) Score - Degree of severity of current depressive symptoms

variable.name: marstat
variable.description: Marital/partner status

variable.name: mdd
variable.description: MDD CIDI-diagnosis - presence

variable.name: mddage
variable.description: MDD CIDI-diagnosis - age of onset

variable.name: neoneu
variable.description: NEO-FFI short form Neuroticism: Total scale score

variable.description: NEO-neuroticism item 1

variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 10

variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 11

variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 12

variable.description: NEO-neuroticism item 2

variable.description: NEO-neuroticism item 3

variable.description: NEO-neuroticism item 4

variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 5

variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 6

variable.name: NEOneu7
variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 7

variable.name: NEOneu8
variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 8

variable.name: NEOneu9
variable.description: NEO neuroticism item 9

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Sex of participant

variable.name: smoker
variable.description: Do you currently smoke cigarettes, pipe of other tobacco?

variable.name: source
variable.description: Source of case

variable.name: STAI1
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 1: I feel pleasant

variable.name: STAI10
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 10: I am happy.

variable.name: STAI11
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 11: I am bothered by disturbing thoughts.

variable.name: STAI12
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 12: I lack self-confidence

variable.name: STAI13
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 13: I feel secure.

variable.name: STAI14
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 14: I feel at ease.

variable.name: STAI15
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 15: I am even-tempered.

variable.name: STAI16
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 16: I am content.

variable.name: STAI17
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 17: There are thoughts that keep haunting me.

variable.name: STAI18
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 18: I take disappointments so hard that I can't put them out of my mind.

variable.name: STAI19
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 19: I am a steady person.

variable.name: STAI2
variable.description: Spielberger Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI) DY2 anxiety item 2: I feel nervous and restless.

variable.name: STAI20
